projects.title: Nautilus
projects.description: Official music video for the French deathcore band : Your Pride.
projects.credits: Music writing, performing : Your Pride www.weareyourpride.com Production : Aurélien Pereira (Flatcurve) http://www.facebook.com/flatcurve Storyboard, direction, animation & compositing : Stéphane Claudon http://www.stephaneclaudon.com Additional VFX : Crapule Prod http://www.facebook.com/CrapuleProduction Astronaut model : Raoul Marks http://www.raoulmarks.com

projects.title: Candide Thovex Quattro 2
projects.description: Official music video for the French deathcore band : Your Pride.
projects.credits:
quattro2 Client: HBO
Director: Patrick Clair 
Lead Animator / Compositor: Raoul Marks
Design & Visual Research: Paul Kim, Jeff Han, Felix Soletic, Maxx Burman, Henry DeLeon, Dan Alexandru.
Storyboard Artist: Lance Slaton
Lighter: Shamus Johnson
Animator / Compositor: Yongsub Song
Head of CG: Kirk Shintari 
3D Artists: Jose Limon Jessica Hurst, Dustin Mellum, Rie Ito, Joe Paniagua
3D Rigging: Josh Dyer 
Producer: Ben Foster
Supervising Producer: Carol Salek
Head of Production: Kim Christensen 
Managing Partner: Jennifer Sofio Hall
Special Thanks to Jonathan Nolan, Lisa Joy, Bruce Dunn, Stephen Semel, Athena Wickham, Roberto Patino and HBO
